title: Most Gulf markets edge up as oil prices recover
summary: Jan 3 ( Reuters ) - Most stock markets in the Gulf edged up on Tuesday as benchmark oil prices, the key catalyst for the region's financial markets, recovered from early losses. Brent crude futures , which had fallen earlier by $1 a barrel, rebounded to $86.29 a barrel by 0737 GMT.
